participant_2.background:
I am proud of my ability to stay focused and motivated on my writing, even when it's difficult.
someday i would like a truck.
My mom would have been proud of me for talking my way out of the ticket.
my mom raised me by herself and taught me to play baseball.
I spent my last birthday with my family at our farm, eating a delicious home-cooked meal and playing games.

content.text: Hi, I'm a 40 year old international businessman, looking for employment.
Hi, I'm a young writer, and I'm proud of my ability to stay focused on my writing.
That's great! Do you have any goals for your writing?
I'd love to publish a book one day.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll do great!
Thanks! I'm also really proud of the way I talked my way out of a ticket the other day.
That's really impressive! I'm not sure I could have done that.
Thanks! I'm glad my mom raised me to be so confident.
That's great! I'm sure she's proud of you.
She would be, she taught me everything I know.
That's wonderful! I'm glad you have such a great relationship with your mom.
Me too!
What do you do for fun?
I love to spend time with my family, go fishing, and play baseball.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love fishing too.
It's so relaxing!
I agree!
My mom raised me on a farm, so I love being outdoors.
That sounds really nice.
It is
